awards.title: Participation Dec 8-10, 2009 in Toronto, Canada, in a selected group of 18 industry professionals to develop an Event Management Certification Program based on the International Occupational Standard for Event Management (IEMS)
awards.description:
The Canadian Tourism Human Resource Council (CTHRC), a not-for-profit government-funded
entity, has developed an Industry Certification Program based on the International
Occupational Standard for Event Management (IEMS). In this context international means that
the Standard and Certification are relevant for and accepted in more than one country. 
The Event Certification was completed in 2010.
The certification program was built on meaningful international stakeholder involvement. The
purpose of this standard and voluntary certification is to increase labour and learner mobility
across countries and events disciplines, not to replace or compete with existing national or
international qualifications.
The IEMS covers all types of events, so a broad representation of events practitioners managing
different types of events (e.g. meetings, exhibitions, festivals, conferences etc.) covering
large/small operations, rural/urban settings, voluntary/non-voluntary, is needed.
Reference:
Eva Schausberger
Director, Foreign Credential Recognition| Directrice du programme de reconnaissance des titres de compétence étrangers
Canadian Tourism Human Resource Council | Conseil canadien des ressources humaines en tourisme 
151 rue Slater Street, Suite/bureau 608  Ottawa, Ontario K1P 5H3
t:613.231.6949 ext./poste 258     f: 613.231.6853       ESCHAUSBERGER@CTHRC.CA
awards.issuer: Canadian Tourism Human Resource Council (CTHRC), Ottawa, Canada

profile_positions.description:
8vance Matching Technologies is a high-tech scale-up developing the first deep matching technology for talents and recruiters. 
8vance trained its matching algorithms with a dataset of over 70 mio profiles. With the flexibility of its Talent Mobility Platform, 8vance offers solutions for various organisations and ecosystems. These can be branch organisations, cities or regions, fields of work, or groups of organisations that decide to join forces.
​Through AI, big data, and virtual assistants, 8vance coaches and supports users in career and HR decision making processes. The matching technology provides data-driven advice on personal development and presents a transparent personal overview of the labour market. 
My job is to correct, update and expand various taxonomies in Dutch, German, English and provide incidental legal and marketing/localisation translation services.

profile_positions.description: Het ArbeidsGilde is een landelijke organisatie in Nederland. Het maakt deel uit van een Europees economisch samenwerkingsverband (EESV). ArbeidsGilde is een onafhankelijke non-profit organisatie voor leer-/werktrajecten, beroepsopleidingen, begeleiding en kennisoverdracht. | The ArbeidsGilde is a national organisation in the Netherlands. It is part of a European Economic Interest Grouping (EEIG). ArbeidsGilde is an independent not-for-profit organisation for training/working programmes, vocational training, vocational support and knowledge transfer.

profile_positions.description:
Executive, responsible for conference programming, networking, funding and budgeting, organisation, team coordination.
 • Design and organisation of financial industry conferences on ESG investment in Europe, Asia and the United States
 • Networking and fundraising with potential sponsors, partnering companies and liaising with media, speakers, moderators, attendees and potential customers 
• Researching conference locations and venues and negotiating rates 
• Logistics planning, on-site preparation, and organising speaker and attendee accommodation
 • Keeping track of deadlines, especially for payments and fees, sending reminders
 • Programming and structuring of conferences and workshops, including content selection, speaker/moderator selection, scenario writing and speaker/moderator instruction
 • Organisation of side events (“Grand Dinner”, “ESG Awards”, cocktail receptions), catering, scenario planning and logistics 
• Keeping up-to-date on latest developments in socially responsible investment, to understand all relevant topics, asset classes, conference branding issues, investment industry needs and geographical issues 
• General responsibility for website design, branding, PR, social media, texting and editing 
• Overall personnel management at the office and during conferences, assigning tasks and responsibilities to individual teams, agreeing targets and time limitations.
profile_positions.title: Conference Director

profile_positions.description: Same as above but without added HRM responsibilities.
